videos.title: Lander Cycling Club Presents: The WYO-131
videos.description: Biggest small gravel race in the West. September 7, 2024

videos.title: WYO-131: Course Preview
videos.description: The ultimate Wyoming cycling experience held annually the second weekend in September. Explore the high desert, historic mining towns, and subalpine terrain near Lander, WY.

videos.title: A Gravel Ride by Wes Anderson WYO-131
videos.description: Just a simple gravel ride in Lander, WY

videos.title: WYO 131- Beaver Rim Plateau: Miles 50-60
videos.description: Take a look at the Beaver Rim Plateau on the WYO-131

it's been really intimidating because

which isn't for everybody now the event
has tripled its registration and we have
three distances that writers can choose

our hope is that with the shorter
distances it's going to bring more

the event is hosted by the Lander
